def getSimularityArrayByKeyword(arr,keyword):
    return process.extract(keyword, choices, scorer=fuzz.token_sort_ratio)

choices = ["apples banana orange", "pineapple oranges banana",                    
           "Apple Google orange", "google kaggle apples",
          "kaggle Bannas pineapple"]
keyword = "banana pine apple"

getSimularityArrayByKeyword(choices,keyword)
